body_text: Heartbeat expects URLs to have a protocol and full domain, but the admin form doesn't validate this, which makes it easy to accidentally use an invalid URL and break things. We should be validating URLs to make sure they have a protocol and domain on submission, and should display an error message indicating the issue on submission.

title: Validate URLs in Heartbeat recipes
body: Heartbeat expects URLs to have a protocol and full domain, but the admin form doesn't validate this, which makes it easy to accidentally use an invalid URL and break things. We should be validating URLs to make sure they have a protocol and domain on submission, and should display an error message indicating the issue on submission.
